name: Puff Pops (In Effect)
description:
When a card whose name was not in your initial deck is added to your Hand: Heal this character for 1 HP.
Usage(s): 3
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When a card whose name was not in your initial deck is added to your Hand:</color> Heal this character for 1 HP.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 3</color>
